New Records: Jeffrey Vandersay took 6 wickets, a significant achievement in the match.
Key Match Events: Jeffrey Vandersay broke the Indian top order’s back with 6 wickets.
Rohit Sharma top scored with 64 runs.
Washington Sundar's three wicket-haul helped India to restrict Sri Lanka to 240/9 from 50 overs.
Sri Lanka defeated India by 32 runs.
Kuldeep Yadav picked the wicket of Wellalage.
Virat Kohli was dismissed for 14 runs.
Shivam Dube was dismissed for 0 runs.
KL Rahul was dismissed for a duck.
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma expressed disappointment in the team's performance and credited Jeffrey Vandersay for his six wickets.
Jeffrey Vandersay spoke about the pressure coming into the side and credited the batters for putting up 240 runs.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at R.Premadasa Stadium in Colombo.
Sri Lanka took a 1-0 lead in the series.
The pitch conditions were challenging, with bounce and turn affecting the match.
